title: game crash
body:
hi guys! my game crashed frequently when it was loading in the game and it told me that i cant connect to the server.But it sometimes works good as normal. idk if there is someone had met the same issue like me and now Riot has already got me low priority in queue. 
i do  really not understand what happened here with my computer or the internet of my room, so can somebody give me some advises or an email that i can get support from. thanks !

replies.body: When exactly is this crash happening?  Is it during the loading screen, champion select, or elsewhere?  As a first step, I suggesting using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up anything that might be blocking your connection specifically to the game servers.  Try those steps and let me know!

thank you a lot! but i did try those method it recommend, and it still didnt work.... The crash occurred in two situations, one is during the loading screen which is like whole black in the screen and shows' cant connect to server,please check your net work connection'. Another is during the game,my champion cant be moved and shows reconnecting, then when i was trying to reconnect by restart the client, it turned out to be situation one again.
sometimes it works as normal, i can play as usual and there is no lag or something. So i was wondering if it is caused by the internet of the region i live or some sort of internet plans issues.

Thanks for the follow up!  The black screen is due to a connection failure that can't download any assets, and the input delays you see in-game further affirms that.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can look into this and help!
